channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Masked trio in horrifying attempted break-in were family members pulling a prank, cops say
U.S. Navy Air-Launched Version Of ‘Cheap’ Blackbeard Hypersonic Missile Hinted At
Trump administration asks the Supreme Court to allow it to fire head of US Copyright Office
Live updates: SNAP fears add to shutdown pressures for lawmakers
UK faces $26.8 billion public finances gap from productivity cut, FT reports
American climber speaks out after history-making ski down Mount Everest
item.description: Climber Jim Morrison and filmmaker Jimmy Chin discussed Morrison's history-making descent of Everest's north side on skis.

item.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk killing can wear street clothes in court amid ‘extraordinary’ attention
item.description: A Utah judge has ruled that the 22-year-old man charged with killing Charlie Kirk can appear in court wearing street clothes but must be physically re...

item.title: WATCH: French police arrest 2 Louvre jewel heist suspects amid manhunt
item.description: Two men from a Paris suburb have been arrested in connection with last week's major jewel heist at the Louvre Museum, French National Police confirmed...

item.title: 1 dead, 6 injured in shooting at Lincoln University homecoming event
item.description: Officials say one student and one graduate are among the people injured in the shooting at Lincoln University in Pennsylvania.

item.title: Missed paychecks, benefit lapses increase pressure for shutdown deal
item.description: The government shutdown stretched into Day 27 on Monday as the stalemate over how to reopen the government continues. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Hamas expands search for remaining hostages' bodies in Gaza
item.description: Under the fragile U.S.-brokered ceasefire reached on Oct. 10, Hamas is expected to return all of the remains of Israeli hostages.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa path: Where and when Melissa will make landfall
item.description: Hurricane Melissa, now a powerful Category 5 storm, will slam into Jamaica on Monday as the worst storm the island has ever seen.

item.title: WATCH: Huge hail churns pool in Australia
item.description: Hail stones pounded a backyard pool and smashed car windscreens in Brisbane, Australia, on Sunday.

item.title: 'I’m going to have hungry kids': Some Americans prepare for halt in SNAP benefits
item.description: Some Americans who receive SNAP benefits said they might not be available to feed their families or pay for household expenses if benefits are paused.

item.title: Here's when Sean "Diddy" Combs is expected to be released from prison
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is expected to be released from a New York federal prison on May 8, 2028, according to online records from the Bureau of Prisons.

item.title: Political violence has gripped the U.S. Experts say it's not as simple as left and right.
item.description: A nationwide string of threats and violent acts present a problem experts say is politically more complex than it seems.

item.title: Trump will meet Japan’s new prime minister and address US troops in next stop on Asia trip
Trump administration posts notice that no federal food aid will go out Nov. 1
